bibl.title: The Artemidorus Papyrus: Solving an Ancient Puzzle with Radiocarbon and Ion Beam Analysis Measurements.
bibl.note: Introduction: The Artemidorus Papyrus. - Materials and methods. - Conclusions. - "The ink used was carbon-based, just like the ink typically used in Greek and Roman times." - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: M.E. Fedi, L. Carraresi, N. Grassi, A. Migliori, F. Taccetti, F. Terrasi &P.A. Mandò, The Artemidorus Papyrus: Solving an Ancient Puzzle with Radiocarbon and Ion Beam Analysis Measurements.
Radiocarbon [University of Arizona] 52 (2010) pp. 356-363, 5 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Introduction: The Artemidorus Papyrus. - Materials and methods. - Conclusions. - "The ink used was carbon-based, just like the ink typically used in Greek and Roman times." - Avec résumé en anglais.
Fedi Carraresi Grassi Migliori Taccetti Terrasi Mandò
